body: Grace took in a deep breath, then got back a bit of her cheerful smile. "Okay. Cool. Do you want anything from the shop?"

options.A: "Yeah, great," I slid her paper slowly over to my side of the table. "A lot better than what I--"
options.B: "Incredible," I slid her paper slowly over to my side of the table. "I’m going to read it to my children every night before they--"
options.C: "You’re getting a tea, right?" I slid her paper slowly over to my side of the table. "I’d love to talk about it, but I think we should--"
